title: StarCraft 2 - SPEED BANSHEES vs NYDUS ROACH | ICYFAR G2 Social Distancing
excerpt: In this week’s episode of I Cast Your Freakin Awesome Replays (ICYFAR) players sent in their StarCraft 2 replays where they leave at least one empty base between each of your expansions (Social Distancing)! Here’s a fun game of zerg versus terran completing the challenge in humorous fashion.   NEW ICYFAR
